item.title: Adding A Command
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“random dude4, post:8, topic:406834”]Oh, so we are running hardcore now? D:?

And actually YES i show’d him EXACTLY where it should be. at the end of a command AFTER the last bracket.

So what about LOOKING after before posting some shit? i didn’t say “after any bracket” that was him. you, my friend, are a retard…[/quote]

You didn’t show him anything. You showed him three random brackets. That could be at the end of the class. Try telling me it would work if you put code after the ending bracket of a class.

item.title: Adding A Command
item.dc:creator: @homerunhitta977 homerunhitta977
item.description:
@homerunhitta977 wrote:

How do I add this command?

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("money")) { c.getItems().addItem(995, 9999999); c.sendMessage("Enjoy your cash."); }

I know that it goes into the commands.java file, but where do I paste it to get the command to work?

Read full topic
